text: Start by selecting a neuron you want to see the connections for in the NEURON panel.
Check the other panels to select the gene expression threshold, the diffusion threshold, the receptor-ligand affinity threshold and the network to look at.
Graphs are interactive. Use the moose to hover or zoom. Reset settings in the bottom left.
The node colours indicate the different neuron types and the line styles indicate the types of neuronal communication.
Download the data for the network and the image.
That's it. Enjoy using NemaMod and don't hesitate if you have suggestions or comments. You're feedback is very much appreciated!
